summary: This is a mod that places Kronica in your game at the Bannered Mare in Whiterun. That is if you want me in your game. :P
descriptionHtml:
Installation

Just simply place kronica.esp inside your data folder and run the game. Make sure the file is checked in data files before launching. 

Uninstallation

Just simply delete the file from your data folder. 

Enjoy and marry me if you wish! :P

Other Notes

I am also in the crime faction so yeah. I thought I would mention that in case I steal something while following you. ;)
author: Kronica
